title: Frequently Asked Questions - {product.name}
meta_title: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum - 10% Vitamin C | Official Store

questions.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is a serum containing 10% Vitamin C. It features key ingredients like Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.

questions.question: What are the main benefits of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: The main benefits are: Brightening, Fades dark spots.

questions.question: What is the concentration of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
How should I apply GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
questions.answer: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

questions.question: Can I use this in the morning?
questions.answer: Yes, it is recommended to apply in the morning before sunscreen.

questions.question: How many drops should I use?
Is this product safe for sensitive skin?
questions.answer: It may cause Mild tingling for sensitive skin, so patch testing is recommended.

questions.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum good for Oily skin?
questions.answer: Yes, it is specifically formulated for Oily skin types.

questions.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum good for Combination skin?
questions.answer: Yes, it is specifically formulated for Combination skin types.

questions.question: How much does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum cost?
Is this product affordable?
questions.answer: At ₹699, it offers great value for a 10% Vitamin C serum.

questions.question: Does it contain Vitamin C?
questions.answer: Yes, Vitamin C is a key ingredient.

questions.question: Does it contain Hyaluronic Acid?
questions.answer: Yes, Hyaluronic Acid is a key ingredient.
